quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Friends and Dog
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, chandlers, rachels. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What was the name of Paul and Jamie Buchmans dog on the series Mad About You?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Murray

questions.question: What was the name of the lovable St. Bernard from the series Empty Nest who was frequently vising his neighbors, the Golden Girls?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dreyfuss

questions.question: What is the name of Ross and Rachels baby on the sitcom Friends?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Emma

questions.question: On the TV show Friends, what name appears on the address label of the TV Guide that comes to Chandler and Joey’s apartment?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Miss Chanandler Bong

questions.question: What was the name of the dog on The Beverly Hillbillies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Duke

questions.question: Sabrina on Sabrina the Teenage Witch had a black magical pet named Salem. What kind of animal was he?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: cat

questions.question: What type of animal was Allies pet, Pumpernickel, on Everybody Loves Raymond?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: hamster

questions.question: In what European city did Friends characters Monica and Chandler begin a secret relationship?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: London

questions.question: Other than Chance, The Waltons from the self-titled show had another pet, which was a dog. What was his name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Reckless

questions.question: What was the name of Phoebes second husband whom she married in season 9 of Friends?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mike

questions.question: What were the names of Monica and Chandlers adopted children on Friends?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Erica and Jack

questions.question: Why did Ross and Rachel break up the first time on the TV show Friends?

options.text: He made a list of pros and cons.
He cheated on her with the copy girl.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He cheated on her with the copy girl.

questions.question: What two Friends characters were high school friends?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Monica and Rachel

questions.question: What fashion label did Rachel work for on the TV show Friends?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ralph Lauren

questions.question: What Friends character was an obese child?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Monica

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: South Park and Series

questions.question: In the movie South Park: Bigger, Longer  Uncut, Kenny dies by lighting himself on fire and having a truck load of salt dumped on him.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Terrance and Phillip from the movie South Park: Bigger, Longer  Uncut are famous for what type of humor according to Sheila Broflovski?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Toilet

questions.question: In the TV series Buffy the Vampire Slayer, when Xander first sees Buffy, he falls off his skateboard.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the film South Park: Bigger, Longer  Uncut, when Wendy tries to talk to Stan, what does it cause him to do?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vomit

questions.question: What cop lives with a Cockatoo named Fred at the King Edward Hotel in apartment 2C?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Baretta

questions.question: In the Season 1 finale of Buffy the Vampire Slayer, titled Prophecy Girl, Buffy died.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What was the name of Colonel Potters horse on M*A*S*H?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sophie

questions.question: This Rutgers University flunky turned mobster wannabe got clipped at the end of The Sopranos season 3 for trying to rob a mob poker game.  Big mistake!
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Giacomo Michael Jackie Aprile, Jr.

questions.question: Who performs the theme song of Buffy the Vampire Slayer series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nerf Herder

questions.question: The original principal of Sunnydale High School in Buffy the Vampire Slayer TV series was eaten by some of his students.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: One of the most shocking whacks in the entire Sopranos series was the death of Christopher Moltisante.  Although it wasnt a usual mafia-type death, who made sure that Christopher did not walk away for the car accident?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tony

questions.question: In the hit series The Sopranos, which mob boss did not die of natural causes?  In other words, which mob boss got whacked?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Phil Leotardo

questions.question: What is the name of Kyles adopted brother in the film South Park: Bigger, Longer  Uncut?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ike

questions.question: What show featured Dennis Weaver riding his horse through downtown Manhattan?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: McCloud

questions.question: In South Park: Bigger, Longer  Uncut, whose house do the Canadians bomb in retaliation for the arrest of Terrance and Phillip?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Baldwins

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Big Bang Theory and Characters
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, network, theory. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: On which TV network did The Big Bang Theory premiere?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: CBS

questions.question: Which of the following statements is true about The Big Bang Theory character Koothrapalli?

options.text: He is engaged to a woman he has never met.
He is a biomedical engineer at Cal Tech.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He hates Indian food.

questions.question: Johnny Galecki, the star of the show The Big Bang Theory and a cast member of Roseanne was born in this city/municipality.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bree

questions.question: In The Big Bang series Penny is writing a book. What is the book about?

options.text: A girl who leaves Minneapolis to go to Los Angeles to be a model.
A girl who leaves Omaha to be an actress in Los Angeles, but becomes a waitress.
A girl who leaves Portland to become a TV  spokeswoman in Los Angeles but becomes a hostess at a Marriott Hotel.
A girl who leaves Seattle to go to Los Angeles to be a writer.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A girl who leaves Omaha to be an actress in Los Angeles, but becomes a waitress.

questions.question: The head writer of The Big Bang Theory is Chuck Lorre. On which of these shows was he NOT a writer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Full House

questions.question: What are the occupations of the five leading characters in The Big Bang Theory?

options.text: Three physicists, an engineer and a  waitress

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Three physicists, an engineer and a  waitress

questions.question: Which character in The Big Bang Theory is portrayed by Johnny Galecki?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leonard

questions.question: Select the INCORRECT statement.

options.text: The Big Bang is a Korean hip Hop band.
The Big Bang is an album by Busta Rhymes
Big Bang Theory is a German alternative rock band.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Big Bang Theory is a German alternative rock band.

questions.question: Fred Hoyle, the director and head writer of the show The Big Bang Theory, selected the shows name.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Who does  Jim Parsons portray in The Big Bang Theory?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sheldon

questions.question: These actors played ex-cop Frank MacBride and ex-con Pete Ryan who started their own detective agency on the TV show Switch.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eddie Albert and Robert Wagner

questions.question: Which of the characters in The Big Bang Theory is portrayed by an actor who is a professional pianist?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wolowitz

questions.question: Which of the  following games is played by the male leads in the show The Big Bang Theory?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Klingon Boggle

questions.question: Which of the characters in The Big Bang Theory lives with his mother?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wolowitz

questions.question: In the 1987 animated film, The Big Bang, Luxembourg invades and conquers England and Italy destroys Libya.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

options.text: Hookin up words and phrases and clauses

Out of the frying pan and into the fire

questions.question: Who played Canteen Boy, one of the recurring characters on Saturday Night Live?

options.text: Ready or Not, Here I Come

questions.question: Who portrayed Gumby on Saturday Night Live?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eddie Murphy

questions.question: What statement is correct according to the theory in cosmology called The Big Bang Theory?

options.text: The universe is contacting at about 2 cm per century.
The Solar System is contracting at about 2cm per century.
The universe will stop expanding in about 6,000 years and then will contract.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The universe is expanding.

questions.question: This actor played Phillip the hyper-hypo kid on the sketch comedy series Saturday Night Live
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mike Myers

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Seinfeld and George
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, seinfeld, bedard. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Irene Bedard and Mel Gibson played lovers in this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pocahontas

questions.question: When did Seinfeld characters Jerry and George begin their friendship?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In Middle School

questions.question: A reference is made to Georges aunt on the TV show Seinfeld. What was her name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Baby

questions.question: What does TV character George Louis Costanza not claim?

options.text: That he could easily be a stand up comic.
That he could be a very good sportscaster.
That he invented the expression Pardon my  French.
That he has an intimate and complete knowledge of  the best toilets in NYC.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: That he could easily be a stand up comic.

questions.question: Where does Georges fathers family come from on the TV show Seinfeld?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tuscany

questions.question: What is Georges favorite drink on Seinfeld?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bosco and milk

questions.question: TV character George Louis Costanza seems to be good at this job.

options.text: Book reader at a publishing house
Manager  of the New York Yankees

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Book reader at a publishing house

questions.question: Which statement is true about Seinfeld character George Louis Costanza?

options.text: George once converted to Lithuanian Orthodox to pursue a woman.
George never shows any intellectual abilities.
George never changes his attitude towards Jerry, when Jerry seems to have a lot of money.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George never changes his attitude towards Jerry, when Jerry seems to have a lot of money.

questions.question: What job does George have when he first appears on Seinfeld?

options.text: Assistant to the travelling secretary of the New York Yankees

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Real estate salesman

questions.question: What was the full name of Susan to whom George was engaged on Seinfeld?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Susan Biddle Ross

questions.question: How does Susan die on the TV show Seinfeld?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She licks poison envelopes.

questions.question: Who takes an IQ test for George in an episode of Seinfeld?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elaine

questions.question: Which statement is true about fictional character George Louis Costanza?

options.text: The character of George appears in all but  three episodes of Seinfeld.
The character of George appears in all but one episode of Seinfeld.
The character of George appears in every episode of Seinfeld.
The character of George first appears in the second episode of Seinfeld.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The character of George appears in all but one episode of Seinfeld.

questions.question: How does Seinfeld character George save a whales life?

options.text: He removes a golf ball from its blowhole.
He removes netting from around its head.
He pushes it out into Long Island Sound.
He pushes it out into the ocean.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He removes a golf ball from its blowhole.

questions.question: TV character George Louis Costanza is pursued by a group of New York tough guys. What is the name of their gang?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Van Buren Boys
